text:
@JakeSherman "Noon" to Trump is "early".  I wonder what time he gets up every day?

A buffet...during a pandemic?   Brilliant.  Shrimp cocktails?Lobster?  Mashed potatoes?  Coronavirus?  Anyone? https://t.co/WK0HnsjHiM
